As a learning process, I've implemented several trivial examples of
RESTful applications on top of Quixote.

I've also written up a document that explains the examples.  There
is also some commentary about doing REST with Quixote and
AOLserver/PyWX (PyWX provides access to AOLserver's API) and about
how this is "a good thing".  It's pretty elementary stuff.  But, it
might be useful to someone new to Quixote and REST.

You can find this document and the source code for the examples at:

    http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/#aolserver
    http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/rest_howto.html

Comments and suggestions and corrections are welcome. (code words
for: Please help me improve this document.)

  - Dave


-- 
Dave Kuhlman
